G

Game - Class in softwareGame
Run the game between a player and the computer.
Game() - Constructor for class softwareGame.Game
Constructor for 2 players.Create a graphical interface and send it a message to enter the player's name.
getDomino() - Method in class graphicInterface.GGame
Return the last domino selected.
getDomino(int) - Method in class softwareGame.Player
Method to obtain a certain Domino from the hand of the player.
getHandSize() - Method in class softwareGame.Player
Method to obtain the size of the List "hand".
getLeftValue() - Method in interface graphicInterface.InterfaceDomino
 
getLeftValue() - Method in class softwareGame.Domino
Method to obtain the left value of a Domino.
getLeftValue() - Method in class softwareGame.Table
Method to obtain the left value of the table, which is one of the two possible values a Domino must have in order to be played.
getName() - Method in class softwareGame.Player
Method to obtain name of the player.
getPlayerName() - Method in class graphicInterface.GGame
Return the name written by the player.
getRightValue() - Method in interface graphicInterface.InterfaceDomino
 
getRightValue() - Method in class softwareGame.Domino
Method to obtain the right value of a Domino.
getRightValue() - Method in class softwareGame.Table
Method to obtain the right value of the table, which is one of the two possible values a Domino must have in order to be played.
GGame - Class in graphicInterface
Graphical interface of the game.
GGame(InterfaceGame) - Constructor for class graphicInterface.GGame
